metadata.title: CVE-2021-47511 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ALSA:pcm: oss: Fix negative period/buffer sizes The period size calculation inOSS layer may receive a negative value as an error, but the code thereassumes only the positive values and handle them with size_t. Due to that,a too big value may be passed to the lower layers. This patch changes thecode to handle with ssize_t and adds the proper error checks appropriately.
